001package com.deploygate.service;
002
003public interface DeployGateEvent {
004    // old format is too ambiguous so we are going to make it clear and safer.
005    //
006    // all values should be <namespace>.<content> since writing this comment :)
007    //
008    // namespace:
009    //   ACTION => a
010    //   EXTRA => e
011    //
012    // content:
013    //   should be hyphen-separated string and be lower cases
014
015    public static final String ACTION_INIT = "init";
016    public static final String ACTION_UPDATE_AVAILABLE = "update";
017    public static final String ACTION_ENABLE_LOGCAT = "enableLogcat";
018    public static final String ACTION_DISABLE_LOGCAT = "disableLogcat";
019    public static final String ACTION_ONESHOT_LOGCAT = "oneshotLogcat";
020
021    public static final String ACTION_SEND_LOGCAT = "sendLogcat";
022    public static final String ACTION_SEND_CRASH_REPORT = "reportCrash";
023    public static final String ACTION_SEND_CUSTOM_LOG = "customLog";
024    public static final String ACTION_INSTALL_UPDATE = "installUpdate";
025    public static final String ACTION_OPEN_APP_DETAIL = "openAppDetail";
026    public static final String ACTION_OPEN_COMMENTS = "openComments";
027    public static final String ACTION_COMPOSE_COMMENT = "composeComment";
028    public static final String ACTION_VISIBILITY_EVENT = "a.visibility-event";
029
030    public static final String EXTRA_AUTHOR = "author";
031    public static final String EXTRA_EXPECTED_AUTHOR = "expectedAuthor";
032
033    /**
034     * A SDK's model version queried by this key from INIT event.
035     */
036    public static final String EXTRA_SDK_VERSION = "sdkVersion";
037
038    /**
039     * A SDK's artifact version queried by this key from INIT event.
040     *
041     * @since 4.7.0
042     */
043    public static final String EXTRA_SDK_ARTIFACT_VERSION = "e.sdk-artifact-version";
044
045    /**
046     * Only active feature flags on this host app.
047     *
048     * @since 4.7.0
049     */
050    public static final String EXTRA_ACTIVE_FEATURE_FLAGS = "e.active-feature-flags";
051    public static final String EXTRA_IS_MANAGED = "isManaged";
052    public static final String EXTRA_IS_AUTHORIZED = "isAuthorized";
053    public static final String EXTRA_LOGIN_USERNAME = "loginUsername";
054    public static final String EXTRA_IS_STOP_REQUESTED = "isStopRequested";
055    public static final String EXTRA_SERIAL = "serial";
056    public static final String EXTRA_VERSION_NAME = "versionName";
057    public static final String EXTRA_VERSION_CODE = "versionCode";
058    public static final String EXTRA_SERIAL_MESSAGE = "serialMessage";
059    public static final String EXTRA_CAN_LOGCAT = "canLogCat";
060    public static final String EXTRA_IS_BOOT = "isBoot";
061    public static final String EXTRA_LOG = "log";
062    public static final String EXTRA_LOG_TYPE = "logType";
063
064    /**
065     * the unique id generated on the client side to identify data
066     */
067    public static final String EXTRA_CID = "e.cid";
068
069    /**
070     * a group id that collects instructions
071     */
072    public static final String EXTRA_INSTRUCTION_GROUP_ID = "e.gid";
073
074    /**
075     * session key of a logcat-stream
076     */
077    public static final String EXTRA_LOGCAT_STREAM_SESSION_KEY = "e.logcat-stream-session-key";
078
079    /**
080     * a marker of the bundle positioning
081     */
082    public static final String EXTRA_BUNDLE_POSITION = "e.bundle-position";
083
084    /**
085     * buffered-at in sdk-side, depends on device-clock.
086     */
087    public static final String EXTRA_BUFFERED_AT_IN_MILLI_SECONDS = "e.bufferedAt";
088
089    /**
090     * this key shouldn't be used. ref: com.deploygate.sdk.Compatibility#SERIALIZED_EXCEPTION
091     */
092    @Deprecated
093    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION = "exception";
094    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_ROOT_CAUSE_CLASSNAME = "exceptionRootCauseClassName";
095    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_ROOT_CAUSE_MESSAGE = "exceptionRootCauseMessage";
096    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_STACKTRACES = "exceptionStackTraces";
097    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_REVISION = "currentRevision";
098    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_DISTRIBUTION_ID = "currentDistributionId";
099    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_DISTRIBUTION_TITLE = "currentDistributionTitle";
100    /**
101     * this key shouldn't be used
102     */
103    @Deprecated
104    public static final String EXTRA_DEPLOYGATE_VERSION_CODE = "deploygateVersionCode";
105    public static final String EXTRA_COMMENT = "comment";
106    public static final String EXTRA_DISTRIBUTION_USER_NAME = "distributionUserName";
107
108    /**
109     * the id of the capture.
110     */
111    public static final String EXTRA_CAPTURE_ID = "e.capture-id";
112
113    /**
114     * A event type for the app goes to foreground/background.
115     */
116    public static final String EXTRA_VISIBILITY_EVENT_TYPE = "e.visibility-event-type";
117
118    /**
119     * The elapsed real time since boot at the time when the app goes to foreground/background.
120     * this value must be nano times.
121     */
122    public static final String EXTRA_VISIBILITY_EVENT_ELAPSED_REAL_TIME_IN_NANOS = "e.visibility-event-elapsed-real-time";
123
124    interface VisibilityType {
125        int BACKGROUND = 0;
126        int FOREGROUND = 1;
127    }
128}
